about_the_game:
About the game

Snakehaus is a colour based puzzle game in which you, as the snake, solve puzzles by
painting on the canvas. Reach that love button at all cost!


THE GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT SO SOME FEATURES MAY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED YET

Features


  • Slither through the board to modify or create artworks!
Levels are more than function—they’re a form of art! You add, mix, and blend colours while slithering around, creating a beautiful masterpiece as you solve the puzzle.

  • Immerse yourselves in the calming BGM
No rush and no pressure—Enjoy the calming music while you work on your art and solve the puzzles to get all the hearts ❤

  • Create your own levels!
Use our level editor to create your own levels and express your creativity!

  • Share your creation to others
Don't forget to share your creation with others! We ensure that you are not lacking in ways of sharing your creativity with people.

Create and Share your works to the world!

About the game

Snakehaus is a colour based puzzle game in which you, as the snake, solve puzzles by
painting on the canvas. Reach that love button at all cost!

Features

Levels are more than function—they’re a form of art! You add, mix, and blend colours while slithering around, creating a beautiful masterpiece as you solve the puzzle.

  • Immerse yourselves in the calming BGM
No rush and no pressure—Enjoy the calming music while you work on your art and solve the puzzles to get all the hearts ❤

name: Snakehaus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6200
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Snakehaus is a relaxing painter-puzzle game where you add, mix, or erase colours to clear a level. Mess around with the existing artworks, or create and share a whole new one.
